content: उज्ज्वल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bright, shining, luminous, splendid; उज्ज्वलकपालं मुखं <ls>Śi. 9. 48</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 9.">47.</ls> {@--2@} Burning. {@--3@} Clean, clear, white; <ls>Śi. 6. 5.</ls> {@--4@} Lovely, beautiful; सर्गो निसर्गोज्ज्वलः <ls>N. 3. 136.</ls> {@--5@} Mixed with, seasoned; <ls>Mk. 8. 13.</ls> {@--6@} Blown, expanded. {@--7@} Unrestrained, full; <ls>Śi. 5. 48</ls> --लः Love, passion. --ला {@--1@} Splendour, brightness. {@--2@} Clearness. {@--3@} A form of the Jagatī metre. --लं Gold.
